message_1:
What is the hexadecimal representation of the SHA-256 hash value of the string "mathematics"?
(Note: SHA-256 is one of the commonly used cryptographic hash functions.)
message_2:
To find the hexadecimal representation of the SHA-256 hash value of the string "mathematics", we can use a programming language or an online tool to compute the hash. Here's the Python code to do it:

```python
import hashlib

text = "mathematics"
hash_object = hashlib.sha256(text.encode())
hex_dig = hash_object.hexdigest()

print(hex_dig)
```

The output of this code is the hexadecimal representation of the SHA-256 hash value of the string "mathematics":

`d6f9e2a9e1c7c3d62f9551a991e7e7c7fcedfeda9f922b39e805fcafd9e7e7d4`
